recommendations: I.Q. Sayed “Muhammad Saad is great at picking up new skills (including learning new languages and frameworks) and delivering work with quality. He also collaborates effectively with colleagues. He'd be a great addition to any organization, in any relevant roles, including software and data engineering.”

LinkedIn User “Muhammad Saad, who worked with me on a research-based machine learning project during his final year of studies. I have had the privilege of mentoring and collaborating with many students over the years, and I can confidently say that Muhammad Saad is among the top talents I have encountered. Muhammad Saad's performance throughout our project was truly exceptional. From the very beginning, he exhibited a keen interest in the field of machine learning and demonstrated a deep understanding of the underlying concepts. His commitment to the project was evident as he consistently went above and beyond to ensure its success. One of Muhammad Saad's notable strengths is his ability to grasp complex theoretical concepts and apply them effectively to real-world problems. He approached the research with a critical and analytical mindset, always seeking innovative solutions and thinking outside the box. In addition to his technical skills, Muhammad Saad proved to be an excellent team player. He actively participated in discussions, shared valuable insights, and collaborated seamlessly with our research team. His strong communication skills allowed him to articulate complex ideas clearly, making him an effective contributor to both our group meetings and project presentations. Muhammad Saad's dedication and work ethic were also commendable. He consistently met project deadlines and was willing to put in the extra effort required to meet our research objectives. Overall, I have no doubt that Muhammad Saad possesses the qualities and potential to excel in the field of machine learning and research. I wholeheartedly recommend Muhammad Saad without reservation. He is an outstanding student and researcher who has the potential to make a lasting impact in the field of machine learning.”
projects: [{"title":"Deep-Q-learning Self driving car","start_date":"Mar 2020","end_date":"Jun 2020","description":"Self Driving car with 4 sensors to detect hurdles around it. the car will run and reach to its destination by the help of x and y coordinates or destination, the performance measure is time and avoiding hurdles between the source and destination. The project can be visualized by Kivy 2D GUI, where user can draw hurdles between the source and destination."},{},{},{"title":"Reverse-Shell with USB autorun","start_date":"Apr 2020","end_date":"Apr 2020","description":"Reverse shell with USB Autorun code. Once the infected USB is inserted in client's PC, the client side code will run automatically. Server program will be on admin's pc with an interactive GUI to run commands on client's PC remotely on background."},{},{},{"title":"Face Verification with Keras Facenet and MTCNN","start_date":"Mar 2020","end_date":"Mar 2020","description":"I have built a face verification program with the help of keras built-in model called 'FaceNet' and MTCNN. Keras Facenet model is used for creating image embeddings of input 3 dimensional image. MTCNN is used for extracting images from input images. after extracting faces and their embeddings, the distance function is used to calculate distance between two face embeddings. if the distance is above a threshold then the classifier states that two faces are of different person's."},{"title":"Information Retrieval CitationAS-Summary-Generator","start_date":"Feb 2020","end_date":"Mar 2020","description":"The program will generate summary by selecting important citation sentences from all the research paper present in data set. the input contains important keywords for which the user wants to know cited sentences along with the name of research papers whose citations have been used in the papers"},{"title":"Eventify -- Society and Event Management Website - Codeigniter MVC framework","start_date":"Sep 2019","end_date":"Nov 2019","description":"Website to manage and announce the University societies, events and their registration."},{},{},{"title":"Linux USB & Character Device Driver","start_date":"Mar 2019","end_date":"Apr 2019"},{"title":"Bioinformatics DNA sequence matching","start_date":"Oct 2018","end_date":"Nov 2018","description":"Contains fast searching algorithm which saves searched information as a cache so that algorithm doesnot have to run everytime a user enter sequence to search."},{"title":"AgroSense - Android Application for agricultural and horticultural dept.","start_date":"Sep 2018","end_date":"Nov 2018","description":"Application which detect Soil Moisture, Temperature and Humidity through a bluetooth device connected to an android phone, Saves data and suggest which plant may grow in the detected environment. Can be used for agriculture and horticulture."},{"title":"Shopping Mall Management System","start_date":"Oct 2017","end_date":"Nov 2017"}]
